name: Candace
description:
Every LyLou bag is hand crafted with a passion for beauty, form, function, and durability. The designer personally selects top-quality vintage and new upholstery fabrics with a keen eye for innovative color combinations, unique pattern, and exquisite texture. An essential accessory for the modern lifestyle, LyLou bags embody the perfect fusion of hip retro flair, timeless style, and contemporary practicality. 

Each bag has two split interior pockets that comfortably fit cell phones.
